title: Absalom’s Downfall Begins
summary: Ahithophel advises Absalom to attack David quickly, but Hushai—David’s spy—gives different advice, which Absalom follows. This delay allows David to regroup. Ahithophel, seeing his counsel rejected, takes his own life.

faq.question: Who was Hushai?
faq.answer: David’s friend who pretended loyalty to Absalom in order to sabotage his plans.

faq.question: Why did Ahithophel kill himself?
faq.answer: Because his wise counsel was rejected and he foresaw failure.
